info.title: Watchful API
info.description: Users on all plans can use the REST (API) to query and update their Watchful data.

parameters.name: ext_name
parameters.description: Do a LIKE search, you can also use %

parameters.name: ext_prefix
parameters.description: Do a LIKE search, you can also use %. technical name of the extension com_xxxx

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Fields to return separate by comas: name,id

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of object to return (max 100, default 25)

parameters.name: limitstart
parameters.description: Start of the return (default 0)

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: ORDER by this field separete by comas. Add + / - after field for set ASC / DESC: type+,name-

parameters.name: siteids
parameters.description: List of sites id separated by comma

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Do a LIKE search, you can also use %

parameters.name: vUpdate
parameters.description: update available for this extension

get.summary: Returns a PDF report for a specific site

parameters.name: compare
parameters.description: Define if you want show previous values in Google Analytics graph

parameters.description: Start of the report, format YYYY-MM-DD, default today-30day

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: log_type
parameters.description: Type of the log to show in the report

parameters.name: reports
parameters.description: Type of reports separate by comas: Ga,Logs,Uptime

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: End of the report, format YYYY-MM-DD, default today
